page.shortlink: grid component client side onnewrowsshow event
page.description: Fires when the user has shown the new record rows in the Grid Part. The Grid must have been set to only show new record rows on demand.
page.discussion: The *[js:onNewRowsShow]* event is triggered when the user toggles the display of new records to be visible. This event is only available if the *[ui:New records edit style]* property in the Grid Component's *[ui:Update Settings]* has been set to *[ui:ShowOnDemand]*.
